texts.text: POSTAL, COURIER AND LOGISTICS COMMISSION ACT, 2025

texts.label: text
texts.orig: AN ACT to establish the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission as a regulatory body to license  and  regulate  the  operation  of  postal,  courier  and  logistics  services;  to  enforce international standards and practices among service providers and to designate a national postal service provider and provide for related matters.
texts.text: AN ACT to establish the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission as a regulatory body to license  and  regulate  the  operation  of  postal,  courier  and  logistics  services;  to  enforce international standards and practices among service providers and to designate a national postal service provider and provide for related matters.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Establishment of the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission
texts.text: Establishment of the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Establishment of the Commission
texts.text: Establishment of the Commission

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 1. (1) There is established by this Act  the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission as a body corporate.
texts.text: 1. (1) There is established by this Act  the Postal, Courier and Logistics Commission as a body corporate.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (2) The Commission may for the performance of functions of the Commission, acquire and  hold  property,  dispose  of  property  and  enter  into  a  contract  or  any  other  related transaction.
texts.text: (2) The Commission may for the performance of functions of the Commission, acquire and  hold  property,  dispose  of  property  and  enter  into  a  contract  or  any  other  related transaction.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (3) Where there is a hinderance to the acquisition of land, the land may be acquired for the Commission under the Land Act, 2020 (Act 1036) and the cost shall be borne by the Commission.
texts.text: (3) Where there is a hinderance to the acquisition of land, the land may be acquired for the Commission under the Land Act, 2020 (Act 1036) and the cost shall be borne by the Commission.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Object of the Commission
texts.text: Object of the Commission

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 2. The object of the Commission shall be to create an efficient system for the provision of standardized  postal,  courier  and  logistics  services  in  a  manner  responsive  to  the  needs  of consumers particularly of persons with physical disability and persons living in underserved and rural areas through the regulation of service providers.
texts.text: 2. The object of the Commission shall be to create an efficient system for the provision of standardized  postal,  courier  and  logistics  services  in  a  manner  responsive  to  the  needs  of consumers particularly of persons with physical disability and persons living in underserved and rural areas through the regulation of service providers.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Functions of the Commission
texts.text: Functions of the Commission

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. The functions of the Commission are to
texts.text: The functions of the Commission are to

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (a) ensure as far as practicable the provision of postal, courier and logistics services throughout the country to meet the demand for the services;
texts.text: (a) ensure as far as practicable the provision of postal, courier and logistics services throughout the country to meet the demand for the services;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (b) ensure that providers of postal, courier and logistics services achieve the highest level of efficiency in the provision of the services and are responsive to customer and community needs;
texts.text: (b) ensure that providers of postal, courier and logistics services achieve the highest level of efficiency in the provision of the services and are responsive to customer and community needs;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (c) grant licences for the operation of postal, courier and logistics services;
texts.text: (c) grant licences for the operation of postal, courier and logistics services;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (d) regulate  the  issue  of  postage  stamps  including  definitive,  commemorative  and special issue postage stamps and any other philatelic items;
texts.text: (d) regulate  the  issue  of  postage  stamps  including  definitive,  commemorative  and special issue postage stamps and any other philatelic items;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (e) provide guidelines on rates of postage and other fees chargeable in respect of postal articles;
texts.text: (e) provide guidelines on rates of postage and other fees chargeable in respect of postal articles;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (f) designate quality standards of equipment for the provision of postal, courier and logistics  services where necessary;
texts.text: (f) designate quality standards of equipment for the provision of postal, courier and logistics  services where necessary;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (g) ensure that the needs of persons with disability are considered in the provision of postal, courier and logistics services;
texts.text: (g) ensure that the needs of persons with disability are considered in the provision of postal, courier and logistics services;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (h) provide assistance to licensees, where practicable;
texts.text: (h) provide assistance to licensees, where practicable;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (i) maintain a register of licensees;
texts.text: (i) maintain a register of licensees;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (j) submit inputs for policy formulation to the Minister for consideration as may be necessary;
texts.text: (j) submit inputs for policy formulation to the Minister for consideration as may be necessary;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (k) ensure strict compliance with this Act and Regulations made under it; and
texts.text: (k) ensure strict compliance with this Act and Regulations made under it; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (l) perform any other functions assigned to the Commission under this Act or any other enactment; or
texts.text: (l) perform any other functions assigned to the Commission under this Act or any other enactment; or

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (m) perform any other function incidental to the object of the Commission.
texts.text: (m) perform any other function incidental to the object of the Commission.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 62. (1)  The Postal and Courier Services Regulatory Commission Act, 2003 (Act 649) is repealed.
texts.text: 62. (1)  The Postal and Courier Services Regulatory Commission Act, 2003 (Act 649) is repealed.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (2) Despite the repeal of Act 649 in subsection (1), any Regulations, authorisation, order, rule or instructions made or done under the repealed enactment and in force immediately before the coming into force of this Act shall continue to have effect as if made or done under this Act until the Regulations, authorisation, order, rule or instruction is revoked, reviewed, cancelled or terminated.
texts.text: (2) Despite the repeal of Act 649 in subsection (1), any Regulations, authorisation, order, rule or instructions made or done under the repealed enactment and in force immediately before the coming into force of this Act shall continue to have effect as if made or done under this Act until the Regulations, authorisation, order, rule or instruction is revoked, reviewed, cancelled or terminated.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: (3) A licence granted by Ghana Post which is in force prior to the coming into force of this Act is deemed to have been granted under this Act by the Commission.
texts.text: (3) A licence granted by Ghana Post which is in force prior to the coming into force of this Act is deemed to have been granted under this Act by the Commission.
